conditions.name: Prior to Screening
conditions.text: Must be performed prior to any screening procedures.

provenance.rationale: Footnote specifies a strict temporal sequence, requiring this activity to be completed before any screening procedures can begin.

conditions.name: Investigator Judgement of Causality
conditions.text: Collect AEs prior to initial dose only if the Investigator considers them causally related to study procedures.

provenance.text_snippet: Medications (prescription or over-the-counter, including vitamins and herbal supplements) will be documented beginning with the Screening Visit and continuing until 30 days following the last dose of
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_INDICATION, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The collection of adverse events in the pre-dose window is explicitly conditioned on the investigator's clinical judgment regarding causality.

conditions.name: Japan and France Sites Only
conditions.text: For subjects enrolled in Japan and France only.

provenance.rationale: Footnote explicitly restricts the activity to subjects in specific geographic locations (Japan and France).

conditions.name: France Sites Only
conditions.text: For subjects enrolled in France only.

provenance.rationale: Footnote explicitly restricts the activity to subjects in a specific geographic location (France).

conditions.name: Women of Childbearing Potential
conditions.text: For women of childbearing potential only.

provenance.text_snippet: Serum pregnancy test within 21 days prior to randomization for women of childbearing potential. Will be completed per certified local laboratory.
provenance.rationale: Footnote explicitly restricts the pregnancy test to the 'women of childbearing potential' sub-population.

conditions.name: Use of Historical Results
conditions.text: Historical results may be used if obtained within 30 days prior to randomization.

provenance.text_snippet: Skeletal survey consists of lateral radiograph of skull, anteroposterior and lateral views of spine, and antero-posterior views of pelvis, ribs, femora, tibiae, fibulae, humeri, ulnae and radii. Histo
validation_flags: LLM returned TEMPORAL_PRIOR, pattern expected DEMOGRAPHIC_SEX
provenance.rationale: The footnote allows for the use of historical results, but this is conditional on them being performed within a specific prior timeframe (30 days).

conditions.name: Japan Sites Only
conditions.text: For subjects enrolled in Japan only.

provenance.rationale: Footnote explicitly restricts the activity to subjects in a specific geographic location (Japan).

conditions.name: History of Plasmacytomas or Clinically Indicated
conditions.text: Perform in subjects with a history of plasmacytomas or if clinically indicated at baseline.

provenance.text_snippet: CT, PET/CT or MRI (same method should be used throughout study) should be performed in all subjects with a history of plasmacytomas or if clinically indicated at baseline to assess for the presence of
validation_flags: LLM returned CLINICAL_EVENT, pattern expected CLINICAL_INDICATION
provenance.rationale: The performance of this assessment is explicitly conditional on either a specific medical history (history of plasmacytomas) or a clinical indication.
